Package net.krotscheck.jersey2.hibernate.factory

Hibernate Component Factories and Injectors.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FulltextSearchFactoryFactory
    This factory will generate a Hibernate Search SearchFactory from the current hibernate session.
    FulltextSearchFactoryFactory.Binder
    HK2 Binder for our injector context.
    FulltextSessionFactory
    This factory creates a request-scoped FulltextSession from the provided hibernate session.
    FulltextSessionFactory.Binder
    HK2 Binder for our injector context.
    HibernateConfigurationFactory
    This factory creates a singleton hibernate configuration object, using either your application's hibernate.properties or hibernate.cfg.xml file.
    HibernateConfigurationFactory.Binder
    HK2 Binder for our injector context.
    HibernateSessionFactory
    This factory builds Hibernate Sessions on a per-request basis, disposing of them after the request has been processed.
    HibernateSessionFactory.Binder
    HK2 Binder for our injector context.
    HibernateSessionFactoryFactory
    This factory provides a singleton Hibernate SessionFactory for your application context.
    HibernateSessionFactoryFactory.Binder
    HK2 Binder for our injector context.

Package net.krotscheck.jersey2.hibernate.factory Description

Hibernate Component Factories and Injectors.
Author:
Michael Krotscheck
